snippet: President Obama edged closer to describing Russia’s military incursions in Ukraine as an invasion and said Russians were supplying heavy arms to separatists in violation of an agreement Moscow signed.
abstract: Pres Obama moves closer to describing Russia’s military incursions in Ukraine as an invasion; says Russians are supplying heavy arms to separatists in violation of an agreement Moscow signed.

byline.contributor: Neil MacFarquhar contributed reporting from Moscow, and Jenny Anderson from London.

lead_paragraph: President Obama edged closer to describing Russia’s military incursions in Ukraine as an invasion and said Russians were supplying heavy arms to separatists in violation of an agreement Moscow signed.

headline.main: Obama Says Russia’s Arming of Separatists Breaks Pact With Ukraine
headline.print_headline: Obama Says Russia’s Arming of Separatists Breaks Pact With Ukraine
